Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and functionality. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe its value exceeds $15000. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $18000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to experience the unparalleled quality and craftsmanship firsthand. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your standards with our top-tier solution. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
